correctness.description: Accuracy of the final answer and each step taken to reach it.

completeness.description: Extent to which all required steps and elements are included in the answer.

reasoning_quality.description: Logical coherence and the traceability of the reasoning process.

response_format.description: Conformance to specified output structure and formatting guidelines.

efficiency.description: Efficiency of the solution process in terms of computation or time.

robustness.description: Ability of the multi-agent system to handle diverse and unexpected inputs without errors.
